body_html:
as seen in the stacktrace, i.e. /cm/shared/apps/parallel_studio_xe_2015_update2/composer_xe_2015.2.164/mkl/lib/intel64/libmkl_gf_lp64.so: undefined symbol: mkl_lapack_sgelqf

this is because you have MKL 2015 which is too old. But more importantly it seems to be loaded into the process already. Maybe you can install mkl from anaconda or intel channels: conda install mkl=2018 -c anaconda or conda install mkl=2018 -c intel
body_text:
as seen in the stacktrace, i.e. /cm/shared/apps/parallel_studio_xe_2015_update2/composer_xe_2015.2.164/mkl/lib/intel64/libmkl_gf_lp64.so: undefined symbol: mkl_lapack_sgelqf
this is because you have MKL 2015 which is too old. But more importantly it seems to be loaded into the process already. Maybe you can install mkl from anaconda or intel channels: conda install mkl=2018 -c anaconda or conda install mkl=2018 -c intel
body:
as seen in the stacktrace, i.e. `/cm/shared/apps/parallel_studio_xe_2015_update2/composer_xe_2015.2.164/mkl/lib/intel64/libmkl_gf_lp64.so: undefined symbol: mkl_lapack_sgelqf`

this is because you have MKL 2015 which is too old. But more importantly it seems to be loaded into the process already. Maybe you can install mkl from anaconda or intel channels: `conda install mkl=2018 -c anaconda` or `conda install mkl=2018 -c intel`
